attributes.action: Counter-terrorism Bill - A Deprivation of Civil Liberties with paramount consequences
attributes.additional_details:
Put yourself in a ‘Post-CTS Bill’ UK. You are a law-abiding citizen, yet people can suspect you of holding extremist ideas/not a holder of British values due to assumptions. Could you live in peace knowing that anyone from any field/walk of life must report you regarding any signs of perceived extremism, with no end to its interpretation?
This Bill is flawed since it has a vague definition of extremism; maintains the secrecy of evidence, incapacitating innocent people to fight the legal case; lacks proper judicial safeguards against this law abuse. Muslims are first to condemn terrorism, being the first victims of Islam’s misinterpretation & misrepresentation. Every true Muslim upholds the Prophetic teaching to save humanity from harm of his/her verbal & physical actions.
All British citizens deserve a CTS law that meets human rights’ obligations whilst not curtailing civil liberties; this bill does the opposite, thus we urge our distinguished Law-makers not to support this Bill.
